00019 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_ZF_FFT[] = "ZF-FFT";
00020 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MEM_STRICT[] = "Strict MEM";
00021 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MEM_STRICT_EV[] = "EV+Strict MEM";
00022 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MEM_STRICT_BURG[] = "Burg+Strict MEM";
00023 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MEM_BURG_AICc[] = "Burg's MEM AICc";
00024 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MEM_BURG_MDL[] = "Burg's MEM MDL";
00025 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_AR_YW_AICc[] = "Yule-Walker AR AICc";
00026 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_AR_YW_MDL[] = "Yule-Walker AR MDL";
00027 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MUSIC_AIC[] = "MUSIC AIC";
00028 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MUSIC_MDL[] = "MUSIC MDL";
00029 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_EV_AIC[] = "Eigenvector AIC";
00030 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_EV_MDL[] = "Eigenvector MDL";
00031 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MVDL[] = "Capon's MVDL(MLM)";
00032 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_LS_HQ[] = "LeastSquare HQ";
00033 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_LS_AICc[] = "LeastSquare AICc";
00034 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_LS_MDL[] = "LeastSquare MDL";
00035 
00036 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::WINDOW_FUNC_DEFAULT[] = "Rect";
00037 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::WINDOW_FUNC_HANNING[] = "Hanning";
00038 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::WINDOW_FUNC_HAMMING[] = "Hamming";
00039 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::WINDOW_FUNC_FLATTOP[] = "Flat-Top";
00040 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::WINDOW_FUNC_BLACKMAN[] = "Blackman";
00041 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::WINDOW_FUNC_BLACKMAN_HARRIS[] = "Blackman-Harris";
00042 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::WINDOW_FUNC_KAISER_1[] = "Kaiser a=3";
00043 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::WINDOW_FUNC_KAISER_2[] = "Kaiser a=7.2";
00044 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::WINDOW_FUNC_KAISER_3[] = "Kaiser a=15";
00045 
00046 SpectrumSolverWrapper::SpectrumSolverWrapper(const char *name, bool runtime,
00047     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> selector, const shared_ptr<XComboNode> windowfunc,
00048     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> windowlength, bool leastsquareonly)
00049     : XNode(name, runtime), m_selector(selector), m_windowfunc(windowfunc), m_windowlength(windowlength) {
00050     if(windowfunc) {
00051         windowfunc->add(WINDOW_FUNC_DEFAULT);
00052         windowfunc->add(WINDOW_FUNC_HANNING);
00053         windowfunc->add(WINDOW_FUNC_HAMMING);
00054         windowfunc->add(WINDOW_FUNC_BLACKMAN);
00055         windowfunc->add(WINDOW_FUNC_BLACKMAN_HARRIS);
00056         windowfunc->add(WINDOW_FUNC_FLATTOP);
00057         windowfunc->add(WINDOW_FUNC_KAISER_1);
00058         windowfunc->add(WINDOW_FUNC_KAISER_2);
00059         windowfunc->add(WINDOW_FUNC_KAISER_3);
00060     }
00061     if(selector) {
00062         if(!leastsquareonly) {
00063             selector->add(SPECTRUM_SOLVER_ZF_FFT);
00064             selector->add(SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MEM_STRICT);
00065     //      selector->add(SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MEM_STRICT_EV);
00066             selector->add(SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MVDL);
00067             selector->add(SPECTRUM_SOLVER_EV_MDL);
00068             selector->add(SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MUSIC_MDL);
00069             selector->add(SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MEM_BURG_AICc);
00070             selector->add(SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MEM_BURG_MDL);
00071             selector->add(SPECTRUM_SOLVER_AR_YW_AICc);
00072             selector->add(SPECTRUM_SOLVER_AR_YW_MDL);
00073     //      selector->add(SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MEM_STRICT_BURG);
00074         }
00075         selector->add(SPECTRUM_SOLVER_LS_HQ);
00076         selector->add(SPECTRUM_SOLVER_LS_AICc);
00077         selector->add(SPECTRUM_SOLVER_LS_MDL);
00078         m_lsnOnChanged = selector->onValueChanged().connectWeak(shared_from_this(), &SpectrumSolverWrapper::onSolverChanged);
00079         onSolverChanged(selector);
00080     }
00081 }
00082 SpectrumSolverWrapper::~SpectrumSolverWrapper() {
00083     if(m_windowfunc) {
00084         m_windowfunc->clear();
00085     }
00086     if(m_selector) {
00087         m_selector->clear();
00088     }
00089 }
00090 FFT::twindowfunc
00091 SpectrumSolverWrapper::windowFunc() const {
00092     FFT::twindowfunc func = &FFT::windowFuncRect;
00093     if(m_windowfunc) {
00094         if(m_windowfunc->to_str() == WINDOW_FUNC_HANNING) func = &FFT::windowFuncHanning;
00095         if(m_windowfunc->to_str() == WINDOW_FUNC_HAMMING) func = &FFT::windowFuncHamming;
00096         if(m_windowfunc->to_str() == WINDOW_FUNC_FLATTOP) func = &FFT::windowFuncFlatTop;
00097         if(m_windowfunc->to_str() == WINDOW_FUNC_BLACKMAN) func = &FFT::windowFuncBlackman;
00098         if(m_windowfunc->to_str() == WINDOW_FUNC_BLACKMAN_HARRIS) func = &FFT::windowFuncBlackmanHarris;
00099         if(m_windowfunc->to_str() == WINDOW_FUNC_KAISER_1) func = &FFT::windowFuncKaiser1;
00100         if(m_windowfunc->to_str() == WINDOW_FUNC_KAISER_2) func = &FFT::windowFuncKaiser2;
00101         if(m_windowfunc->to_str() == WINDOW_FUNC_KAISER_3) func = &FFT::windowFuncKaiser3;
00102     }
00103     return func;
00104 }
00105 void
00106 SpectrumSolverWrapper::windowFuncs(std::deque<FFT::twindowfunc> &funcs) const {
00107     funcs.clear();
00108     funcs.push_back(&FFT::windowFuncRect);
00109     funcs.push_back(&FFT::windowFuncHanning);
00110     funcs.push_back(&FFT::windowFuncHamming);
00111     funcs.push_back(&FFT::windowFuncFlatTop);
00112     funcs.push_back(&FFT::windowFuncBlackman);
00113     funcs.push_back(&FFT::windowFuncBlackmanHarris);
00114     funcs.push_back(&FFT::windowFuncKaiser1);
00115     funcs.push_back(&FFT::windowFuncKaiser2);
00116     funcs.push_back(&FFT::windowFuncKaiser3);
00117 }
00118 
00119 void
00120 SpectrumSolverWrapper::onSolverChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) {
00121     shared_ptr<SpectrumSolver> solver;
00122     bool has_window = true;
00123     bool has_length = true;
00124     if(m_selector) {
00125         if(m_selector->to_str() == SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MEM_BURG_AICc) {
00126             solver.reset(new MEMBurg(&SpectrumSolver::icAICc));
00127         }
00128         if(m_selector->to_str() == SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MEM_BURG_MDL) {
00129             solver.reset(new MEMBurg(&SpectrumSolver::icMDL));
00130         }
00131         if(m_selector->to_str() == SPECTRUM_SOLVER_AR_YW_AICc) {
00132             solver.reset(new YuleWalkerAR(&SpectrumSolver::icAICc));
00133         }
00134         if(m_selector->to_str() == SPECTRUM_SOLVER_AR_YW_MDL) {
00135             solver.reset(new YuleWalkerAR(&SpectrumSolver::icMDL));
00136         }
00137         if(m_selector->to_str() == SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MUSIC_AIC) {
00138             solver.reset(new MUSIC(&SpectrumSolver::icAIC));
00139         }
00140         if(m_selector->to_str() == SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MUSIC_MDL) {
00141             solver.reset(new MUSIC(&SpectrumSolver::icMDL));
00142         }
00143         if(m_selector->to_str() == SPECTRUM_SOLVER_EV_AIC) {
00144             solver.reset(new EigenVectorMethod(&SpectrumSolver::icAIC));
00145         }
00146         if(m_selector->to_str() == SPECTRUM_SOLVER_EV_MDL) {
00147             solver.reset(new EigenVectorMethod(&SpectrumSolver::icMDL));
00148         }
00149         if(m_selector->to_str() == SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MVDL) {
00150             solver.reset(new MVDL);
00151         }
00152         if(m_selector->to_str() == SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MEM_STRICT) {
00153             solver.reset(new MEMStrict);
00154         }
00155         if(m_selector->to_str() == SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MEM_STRICT_EV) {
00156             solver.reset(new CompositeSpectrumSolver<MEMStrict, EigenVectorMethod>());
00157         }
00158         if(m_selector->to_str() == SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MEM_STRICT_BURG) {
00159             solver.reset(new CompositeSpectrumSolver<MEMStrict, MEMBurg>());
00160         }
00161         if(m_selector->to_str() == SPECTRUM_SOLVER_LS_HQ) {
00162             solver.reset(new FreqEstLeastSquare(&SpectrumSolver::icHQ));
00163         }
00164         if(m_selector->to_str() == SPECTRUM_SOLVER_LS_AICc) {
00165             solver.reset(new FreqEstLeastSquare(&SpectrumSolver::icAICc));
00166         }
00167         if(m_selector->to_str() == SPECTRUM_SOLVER_LS_MDL) {
00168             solver.reset(new FreqEstLeastSquare(&SpectrumSolver::icMDL));
00169         }
00170     }
00171     if(!solver) {
00172         solver.reset(new FFTSolver);
00173     }
00174     if(m_windowfunc)
00175         m_windowfunc->setUIEnabled(has_window);
00176     if(m_windowlength)
00177         m_windowlength->setUIEnabled(has_length);
00178     m_solver = solver;  
00179 }
